body_html:
Apologies for the churn and confusion.
@ebrevdo and @xiejw can comment, but I believe the reasoning for the separation is because we're moving some parts into core.

BasicLSTMCell can be found in tf.nn.rnn_cell.BasicLSTMCell. Same for MultiRNNCell.

The API docs are a good place to search for these.

Again, apologies, this churn should become a non-issue after 1.0.

body:
Apologies for the churn and confusion.
@ebrevdo and @xiejw can comment, but I believe the reasoning for the separation is because we're moving some parts into core.

`BasicLSTMCell` can be found in `tf.nn.rnn_cell.BasicLSTMCell`. Same for `MultiRNNCell`.

The [API docs](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/) are a good place to search for these.

Again, apologies, this churn should become a non-issue after 1.0.
